Title: Hysteria
Writer: Stephen Dyer (story), Jonah Lisa Dyer (story), Stephen Dyer (screenplay), Jonah Lisa Dyer (screenplay), Howard Gensler (original story)
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Jonathan Pryce, Felicity Jones
Plot: The truth of how Mortimer Granville devised the invention of the first vibrator in the name of medical science.
